description: Les Cuisines Nourricières focuses on promoting cooking and nutrition education through collective catering. It aims to address the lack of cooking knowledge among communities, particularly in schools and public establishments. By offering training and workshops, the initiative supports local authorities and engages chefs to enhance food quality and sustainability. It emphasizes the importance of collaboration among various stakeholders, including educators, healthcare professionals, and local producers, to create a comprehensive approach to food education. The movement fosters knowledge sharing and aims to improve the overall food experience for individuals across different settings.
name: Les Cuisines Nourricières
